message: I'll be coming to SF/Bay area in mid-May with a couple friends to check out startups in the area for a few months and hopefully to work on one; any suggestions to what area would have fairly cheap housing/close to other startups?

My experience moving to the bay area was that the availability of apartments changed literally week to week. Check craigslist a lot, and if you want cheap rent not much you can do besides live with a lot of people. I moved into a huge place with 7 other people and my rent is $400 lower than anywhere else I've lived.
Great, thanks. I believe we're looking into South Bay area right now.
